Articles.Content:
I have a symmetrical spaceplane. Under 1x physics warp it flies straight with no control input, slowly dipping into a dive. The prograde marker tracks vertically down the navball.

If I turn on 2x, 3x or 4x physics warp, the plane starts to yaw and roll to the right. It's always to the right, even if I initially set up the plane with some slight roll to the left. 

The effect is more pronounced the higher the physics warp.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T08:43:21Z" title="05/02/2015 08:43  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by allmhuran**
I am having the same issues with Linux x64
